reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 16/00: ONTARIO COURT OF JUSTICE - FEES
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 16/00: ONTARIO COURT OF JUSTICE - FEES

content.content:
1. The following fees are payable:  1.

For making copies of documents:

 


 

i. not requiring certification, per page

$2.00


 

ii. requiring certification, per page

3.50 O. Reg. 16/00, s. 1.
